about_the_game:
Synopsis

When a human life ends, their soul has two destinations: the virtuous go to heaven, and the wicked go to hell. The protagonist, a girl named Kuzu, is sent to hell. Kuzu interacts with beings called Narehate and helps fulfill their wishes. This is a story of confronting one’s sins…

How to Play

Players can interact with Narehate across various locations and earn hearts by helping them with their wishes. Collect six hearts to escape from hell. The game features a variety of strange characters, memorable maps, and original music composed to immerse you in the depths of hell.

Note: This story is purely fictional and has no relation to any actual events, people, religions, or organizations.

• Ending: 1 type
• Estimated Playtime: 1 hour
• Controls (Keyboard):
• Move: Arrow keys
• Investigate: E key
• Display Guide: Q key
• Camera Control (in some scenes): Mouse
• Save Function: Available

Streaming Guidelines

1. Regarding Streaming and Let’s Play Videos
• You do not need to contact us in advance to stream or create Let’s Play videos of our game.
• You are free to create content regardless of whether it is monetized or not.
2. Important Notes
• Please refrain from acts of defamation or making offensive comments about others.
• Treat the game content and other players with respect.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mild depictions of violence and blood. Please be aware of this when playing.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Explore the mysterious world of hell in this walking simulator. Search for six hearts while encountering strange characters and impressive landscapes. The haunting music, composed for this game, draws you deeper into the depths of hell.
